page.title: 09SANDOZ CHEMICALS HORSFORTH
page.content: The British Headquarters of Sandoz occupies a prominent position in the Airedale valley in the western district of Horsforth.The buildings include laboratories, works,offices,warehouses,a restaurant,a garage,a car park,a sports club with grounds and some employees houses set amongst gardens and lawns.Despite its rural location there are no special travel problems since the company provides a free bus service for employees. Sandoz is a subsidiary of Sandoz,Basle,Switzerland and is concerned with the development,production and marketing of dyestuffs,chemicals and pharmaceutical products.The staff number 900 and sales are in excess of Â£40m per annum of which 12% is exported.
